content: CPF PFF Panel 1 Seedly PFF 2019 Asked by JavierAsked on 02 Mar 2019The CPF rules might have already changed in future when we reach 65. How can the IM65 be bulletproof in this sense?1 answerAnswerBump9
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Vincent Tan Wen Bin, Assistant Vice President at Thinkers AllianceLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 18 Jun 2019Why not diversify your investments?
I believe the 1M65 is still valid in the sense that as long as you are saving and investing at a high enough rate, 1 million is achieveable as long as you start young and contribute in excess to your CPFBut if you are afraid of the changes that might come in the future, why not just diversify your investments into other assets such as REITS, funds, stocks, bonds etc.0 comments0
